text: What's up Finland?
Moi!
I'm Marko
and I'm Alex

and we're the Vagabrothers, two brothers and
travel film makers from California, and in
two weeks we are coming to Finland.

That's because Visit Finland has hooked us
up with an amazing trip from Helsinki, to

the arctic circle in Lapland and they've even
signed us up for the World Wife Carrying Championships.

Now if you don't know what that is, it's pretty
awesome. Basically it's a race where a man
carries a woman over 253 meters of asphalt, dirt, water, grass all to win her weight in...
you guessed it
No you didn't
Beer.
Yes!

For the last six months we have been doing
everything we can to prepare... pushing ourselves

to the physical limit and almost getting our
asses kicked in the process.

Hey stop, don't!!! You guys can't do this...
this is Los Angeles.

But with two weeks left we are still missing
two very important things...
wives!

So ladies of Finland... will you marry us?
If just for one day?

Sound like fun? Good. Here are the rules:
If you are over 17, over 49 kilos...
- preferably, just over 49 kilos -

...and free to meet us at the event on July
5th, then tweet us @Vagabrothers and @VisitFinland

and let us know your name, husband of choice
and why we should carry you over the Finnish
line. Haha...get it? Finnish as in Finland.
Anyways, if you want to be our wives, tweet us, share this video with your friends and
we will see you in Finland.
Wish us luck - we're going to need it.
